title: You're in Good Hands with Al Tate
description: What happens when you throw a "big city" guy and a "small town" gal together in Manhattan high society? Maybe something wonderful for both of them. That is, if they can manage to survive disastrous dates and comical catastrophes.Alan Tate, one of New York's most successful stockbrokers, lives in Manhattan. His plan to leave the rat race behind and move to a small town sounds better every day. Until he meets his sexy new neighbor, Susan.Romance writer Susan Pierson longs for the bright lights and excitement of the "big city" and takes a job in Manhattan writing for SIZZLING DESIRE MAGAZINE. After seeing her handsome neighbor, Susan can't help but fantasize. Mmm mmm,baby!Hilarity and steamy romance reign in this award-winning romantic comedy filled with hilarious situations that build to a steamy and unforgettable evening of passion.
author: Deborah Gafford
